revised_title: Tides of Arctic Seas: Observations and Analysis of Tides in Refuge Cove, Wellington Channel
tldr: The author analyzes the tides of the Arctic seas, specifically in Refuge Cove and Bellot Strait, using observations made in 1859. The study focuses on the diurnal and semidiurnal tides, their intervals, and the influence of the Sun and Moon on these tidal patterns.
